metadata.synopsis: Lae'zel approaches you in camp. You are showing symptoms of ceremorphosis. So is everyone else. She threatens to kill everyone unless you convince her to stand down. She is afraid, though does not wish you to know it.

22.speaker: Narrator
22.text: *The air is heavy. Moisture drips down your forehead; pain shoots through your fingers.*
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player stumbles through the forest, proping themselves against a tree

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Wipe the sweat from your brow.

60.speaker: Narrator
60.text: *Your hands shake as they reach upward. Your forehead remains drenched, no matter how much you wipe.*
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player shakily wipes their forehead

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *The ache builds as you squeeze your hands together. Were your fingers always so thick, your skin always so sticky?*
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player shakily rubs their hands

32.speaker: Lae'zel
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: | Lae'zel appears behind you, blade to your throat. (Or similar threatening position.) She is poised to strike. |NodeContext: CHK-ill gayk VLAH-kith mm zah-THOCK! Mind flayer - abomination to Vlaakith!

25.speaker: Lae'zel
25.text: Can you feel it crawling through you? Tendrils squirming in your chest, gripping your heart, piercing your belly? Your bones popping, your flesh swelling?

61.speaker: Lae'zel
61.text: I can. I see it in you. I feel it in me. We are lost.

50.speaker: Lae'zel
50.text: I will be quick with my blade. First you. Then the others. Then myself.

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *Your minds intertwine. You sense a touch of uncertainty, a touch of disgust.*

19.speaker: Narrator
19.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

27.speaker: Narrator
27.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

9.speaker: Narrator
9.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

56.speaker: Narrator
56.text: *Lae'zel's fear grips you. Not fear of death, but fear of insignificance.*

23.speaker: Narrator
23.text: *The great warrior Lae'zel, a failure to her kind. She will wield no silver sword, ride no red dragon, forever unknown to the great lich queen Vlaakith.*

55.speaker: Narrator
55.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

54.speaker: Narrator
54.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

66.speaker: Narrator
66.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

65.speaker: Narrator
65.text: *Lae'zel's mind holds you at length. Her thoughts remain unknown.*

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Be strong. You will survive this. You will please your queen!

18.speaker: Lae'zel
18.text: I will not let the ghaik take me. I will earn Vlaakith's honour.

6.speaker: Lae'zel
6.text: I will wait. But know this: I am watching. If the sickness does not pass come dawn...

44.speaker: Lae'zel
44.text: Bah - I cannot trust my own mind. So it seems I must trust yours.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: We're just exhausted. Lower the blade before you do something foolish.

57.speaker: Lae'zel
57.text: It feels as if a snake is slithering through every limb. My throat burns like flames erupted within.

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: This is not exhaustion. This is ceremorphosis.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: It's just a fever. Rest will break it.

42.speaker: Lae'zel
42.text: This is no simple fever. This is ceremorphosis.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Don't you see how far gone you are? Give me that blade - I'll make it quick.

46.speaker: Lae'zel
46.text: The monster in you craves birth. I trust no one but me to deny it.

30.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel lets the player up handing them her knife

3.speaker: Lae'zel
3.text: Take it. One motion. Across the neck.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: No one is dying tonight. We still have time.

13.speaker: Lae'zel
13.text: Chk - a splendid ruse. My anger is surpassed only by my respect.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Player stows blade and rises with LazaelNodeContext: You deceived her. Lae'zel is both angry and impressed.

20.speaker: Lae'zel
20.text: I will not be ghaik. Vlaakith gha'g shkath zai!
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Player executes Lae'zel with one slice of the blade.NodeContext: VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI! For the honour of Vlaakith!

39.speaker: Player
39.text: Surrender to Lae'zel. You will not become an abomination.

33.speaker: Lae'zel
33.text: Let it be so. Vlaakith gha'g shkath zai!
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel kills the player and walks away, steaming. Game OverNodeContext: VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI! For the honour of Vlaakith!

7.speaker: Lae'zel
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player throws Laezel off and takes a combative stanceNodeContext: VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI! For the honour of Vlaakith!

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Press your fingers to your mouth.

12.speaker: Narrator
12.text: *Your finger traces the arc of your lips. Wetness: sweat, blood, and saliva mixed into one viscous liquid.*
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player shakily rubs their lips

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *The world swims as you close, then reopen your eyes. How long have you been waiting here? A moment? A night? A tenday?*
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player shakes their head trying to find their bearings
